name: Eternal Knit Tee
description: Made in Italy, the Eternal Knit Tee is made from a 100% virgin wool, and detailed with a jacquard "ETERNAL" logo. The design features a crew neckline with volume in the body and 3/4 sleeves. A Fear of God label is stitched at the back collar.

name: Eternal Merino Knit Hoodie
description: The Eternal Knit Hoodie is knitted in Italy from 100% merino wool, and detailed with a jacquard "ETERNAL" logo. The designed volume in the body and sleeves to creates a round silhouette. The hood, rib-knit cuffs, and waist hem frame the piece. A Fear of God label is stitched on the hood.

name: Fine Knit Henley Tee
description: The Eternal Knit Henley Tee is crafted in Italy from 100% extra-fine baby merino wool. This contemporary henley features relaxed proportions, with dropped shoulders and 3/4 sleeves. Its henley placket design enhances the clean, modern aesthetic. A Fear of God label is stitched at the back collar.

name: Eternal Hoodie
description: The Eternal Hoodie is made in Portugal from a heavy cotton blend with an embossed "ETERNAL" logo on the front. The signature Fear of God fit is evident with a relaxed silhouette, dropped shoulders, double-layered hood,  rib-knit cuffs and waist hem. Additional details include side pockets, and a Fear of God label is stitched on the hood.

name: Short Sleeve Oxford Shirt
description: The Short Sleeve Oxford Shirt is stitched in Italy from virgin wool-cotton blend with elastane for stretch comfort. The classic Oxford shirt style is remade with a minimalist covered placket with horn buttons.  A Fear of God  label is stitched at the back collar.

name: Denim Button Up Shirt
description: The Button Up Shirt is stitched in Italy from a medium indigo denim with a minimalist covered placket with horn buttons. A Fear of God label is stitched at the back collar.

name: Wool Cashmere Overshirt
description: The Overshirt is made in Italy from a blend of wool-cashmere, giving a luxurious texture with versatile style. The double-layered piece features the brand's signature elements such as a relaxed fit with dropped shoulders. Additional details include point collar, front metal snap placket, and Fear of God  label is stitched at the back collar.

name: Printed Jersey Lounge Tee
description: The Printed Jersey Tee is made from a 100% cotton jersey for lounge comfort. A stacked "LOUNGE FEAR OF GOD" logo is on the front, while a Fear of God label is stitched at the back collar.

name: Merino Full Zip Sweater
description: Made in Italy, the Full Zip Sweater is knitted from a heavy merino wool, and detailed with a jacquard "F" on each sleeve. The design features a full front zip with volume in the body and sleeves for pronounced drape. A Fear of God leather label is stitched at the back collar.
